title: Cosmic Queries: More Space and Science with Bill Nye
description: Get schooled on space and science by guest host Bill Nye and Chuck Nice when they answer your Cosmic Queries about everything from evolution and carbon dating to gravity and the Doppler effect.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
